job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongAt Boeing we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place From the seabed to outer space you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity equity and inclusion are shared values Were committed to fostering an environment for every teammate thats welcoming respectful and inclusive with great opportunity for professional growth Find your future with usbrbrstrongThe Boeing Companystrong is currently seeking an strongEntry Level Software Engineerstrong to join the strongC17CASBFMS Laboratory Operations Teamstrong located in strongLong Beach CAstrong The selected candidate will work with senior engineers to design and develop test equipment and operate test equipment in a laboratory environmentbrbrstrongPosition overview is as followsbrbrstrongAssists with the documentation and maintenance of architectures requirementsbrbralgorithms interfaces and designs for software systems Develops and maintains code andbrbrintegrates software components into a fully functional software system Assists with testbrbrprocedures and documenting test results to ensure software system requirements are metbrbrGathers information to support software project management Documents deployedbrbrprocesses and tools and collect metrics Supports software research and developmentbrbrprojects Troubleshoots basic software issues Works under close supervisionbrbrstrongPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongulliParticipates in gathering and analyzing requirements for test measurement systemsliliAssists in the development of test procedures and instrumentation and configuration definition to perform the test within the constraints of the test planliliPerforms data analysis develops and utilizes data processing toolsliliDesigns simple component level hardware or softwareliliUses analytical tools to verify the designliliVerifies collection of complete data setliliMaintains test logs prepares simple test reports and archives dataliliWorks under direct supervisionbrbrliulstrongThis position must meet Export Control compliance requirements therefore a US Person as defined by 22 CFRbrbrulli12015 is required US Person includes US Citizen lawful permanent resident refugee or asylee brbrliulstrongBasic Qualifications Required SkillExperiencebrbrstrongulliBachelor of Science degree in Engineering Computer Science Mathematics PhysicsliliProgramming experience in at least one or more of the following languages C C Java Ada C PythonbrbrliulstrongPreferred Qualifications Desired SkillsExperiencebrbrstrongulliExperience using common software version control tools such as GitliliExperience with Realtime softwareliliExperience debugging and troubleshooting technical problems involving computer memory or timing considerationsliliA positive attitude towards learning software quality and teamworkbrbrliulstrongTypical EducationExperiencebrbrstrongEducationexperience typically acquired through advanced technical education from an accredited course of study in engineering computer science mathematics physics or chemistry eg Bachelor or an equivalent combination of technical education and experience In the USA ABET accreditation is the preferred although not required accreditation standardbrbrstrongRelocationbrbrstrongRelocation assistance is not a negotiable benefit for this position Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expensebrbrstrongDrug Free WorkplacebrbrstrongBoeing is a Drug Free Workplace where post offer applicants and employees are subject to testing for marijuana cocaine opioids amphetamines PCP and alcohol when criteria is met as outlined in our policiesbrbrstrongAdditional Job DescriptionbrbrstrongemAt Boeing we strive to deliver a Total Rewards package that will attract engage and retain the top talent Elements of the Total Rewards package include competitive base pay and variable compensation opportunitiesbrbrememThe Boeing Company also provides eligible employees with an opportunity to enroll in a variety of benefit programs generally including health insurance flexible spending accounts health savings accounts retirement savings plans life and disability insurance programs and a number of programs that provide for both paid and unpaid time away from work brbrememThe specific programs and options available to any given employee may vary depending on eligibility factors such as geographic location date of hire and the applicability of collective bargaining agreementsemstrong
